group_1.narration: "Hiko-kun had never changed,@he was the same as before: a kind bae who@knew-it-all and could teach me everything.@But at school, they treated him like some@typical emo loner."
"This cutie got to be more open with everyone@than before, and in middle school I was in one of@those, like, popular cliques in the class."

"Since me and Hiko-kun were like different@in every way and they were probs all gonna say@our relationship was a seriously bad match,@we thought it'd be awful if they found out...@so we dated in secret."
[se:7106_telmail]*Bleepâ™ª*

group_1.textLeft: (Hiko-kun...)
(He hasn't been respondin' to my messages lately,@and he wouldn't meet me...)

group_1.textRight: Ah, it's him, that lame-ass gloomy nerd.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...
(He avoided me...?)

group_1.textRight: So like, Himena, are you going out with him?

group_1.textLeft: Wh-why...?

group_1.textRight: There's kinda a rumor going around.
You probably wanna just deny it, y'know?

group_1.narration: "Our relationship got@exposed somehow, and Hiko-kun's bullying@got way worse because of it."
"That's why you were avoiding me on purpose, right...?@So I wouldn't get caught up in the mess..."
"But this cutie wasn't able to think of anything.@I tried so hard to do something about it, but..."
"Instead of helping Hiko-kun,@even I became a target of bullying..."

group_1.textLeft: Seriously... Why is every one of them such total@scum...!
Why are YOU apologizing, Hiko-kun?!
It's THEM assholes who are at fault!
All we ever wanted was to be together...!

group_1.textRight: I knew back then that someone like me shouldn't@have gone out with you...

group_1.textLeft: Hiko-kun... Don't say that kinda shit...!

group_1.textRight: As long as I'm here, you'll just keep getting hurt...

group_1.textLeft: You don't gotta do anything, you know!
I'll take care of it, I promise, whatever it takes...!
So c'mon... Let's stay together, Hiko-kun...

group_1.narration: "Cute lil' me's not as smart as Hiko-kun,@so no matter how much I chewed it over,@I couldn't figure out the ideal move to save him."
"But, there's gotta be a way we can make it work."
"Our happiness will totally last forever."
"...That's what I was so sure of."
"Even though I had like, no grounds whatsoevs@to believe that, right..."

group_1.textLeft: Stop it, Hiko-kun!!
Why do you gotta die?!

group_1.textRight: Without me, you won't be hurt anymore.
Considering that, this is the only thing I can do...

group_1.textLeft: NO!
I CAN'T be without you, Hiko-kun!
This cutie wants to be with you...!
Yeah... Let's get out of this shitty place together!
Let's just live together, only the two of us, forever!

group_1.textRight: No, Himena, you'll be hurt by my very existence...
If that's the way the future is going to go, I won't@be able to stand it.

group_1.textLeft: This cutie's OK with it...! So let's stay together...!

group_1.textRight: If you try to keep me alive in this world...
Himena... Even if it's you, I'd still hate you.
Loss hurts, but only for now...

group_1.textLeft: Hiko-kun...!!

group_1.narration: "I wanted to stop Hiko-kun,@but if I tried to keep him alive in this world,@he'd hate me for the rest of my life."
"That's as crazy as Hiko-kun going away,@and it's basically like being told to die..."
"And before this cutie could make up her mind,@Hiko-kun hanged himself and said goodbye to this world."
"Keeping Hiko-kun alive in this world was totally hell,@and he didn't want that."
"Then I thought that if there was a place where@it was just me and Hiko-kun, where we could@live happily together without being scared of nobody,@then we could be free to love each other."
"...I'm not a smart girl,@and I could only think of one such place."
"So, for a one-in-a-million shot at@making it come true...I wished to Kyubey when he@appeared to me back then."

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay, then. Grant me my wish.
Make it so that inside myself, I can be together@with Hiko-kun.
